reviews.text: After our booked hotel failed to live up to it expectations, we chanced upon this little gem. What a find! The hotel is in an excellent location in the "Paris" end of Collins St. Everything is within an easy walk- transport, great food, theatres, shopping, nightlife etc. The 1 bedroom apartment was very spacious and as it was recently upgraded when Quest took over from Oakford, everything is new and sparkling. Having a spa bath was a bonus too. There is a complimentary guest laundry which was very handy as we stayed for a week. We had no problems with noise from other guests or from traffic. The reception staff were very friendly and helpful, and gave us a fabulous deal for the week. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this hotel to anyone.
reviews.title: Will definitely stay again!

reviews.text: This hotel is fine - it is currently undergoing a much needed refurbishment and should be great when completed. It is in one of the most convenient locations in Melbourne, right across the road from the theatre and just around the corner from the mall.
reviews.title: Renos underway

likes.disliked: — Under renovation (dusty and crowded but not noisy)
